item.title: CVE-2024-43307|2024-08-19T14:41:19.243Z -- gordon%20b%C3%B6hme%2C%20antonio%20leutsch -- structured%20content
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Gordon Böhme, Antonio Leutsch Structured Content allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Structured Content: from n/a through 1.6.2.
